name: Jissen Kyoutei
overview: Jissen Kyoutei ("Combat Motorboat Racing") is a simulation game for the Super Famicom. It features competitive motorboat racing. Rather than racing directly, the player gambles on the result of each motorboat race and the placement of competitors, earning money from accurate bets. The game has a single-player mode with its own story, and a multiplayer mode that allows for up to four human players competing to make the best predictions.
